GlobalData * _gd

Detailed Description

Reference to an global data. Its a shared of any type

Be carreful, even if formal shared types do not derived from Shared, part of the code assume to be possible to cast Shared_r* to Shared* in order to access to _rep field. Data structure Shared and Shared_xx should have to define first the _rep field.
